reviewText: All three were very good, especially A Season for Miracles, and A Dog Named Christmas.  Christmas in November was also touching.
LOVE LOVE LOVE THESE MOVIES AND AT A GREAT PRICE TOO !!

This was a great value & I loved "A Dog Named Christmas" which I had never seen. "November Christmas & "A Season for Miracles" were already 2 of our family's favorites!  Christmas is a blessed time of  the year & we like movies like these as opposed to ridiculous comedies.  After all, Real life is filled with true humor, laughter, heartache, good times & hard times.  Thank you Hallmark for making great movies!

I saw all 3 of the movies over the christmas holiday. My Sister loved the movies and so since I knew that she loved it so much I decided to purchase the set and give it to her as a Christmas present and she was so surprised to receive it Here comes the flow of tears from her. I know that she will watch it next year. I hope she enjoys it I know that I did..We were both very pleased and we thank you very kindly. Be Blessed.
hallmark movies are always the best.  i had not seen two of these movies yet, and it was so nice tosee something new.
My husband loves A Dog named Christmas!! I liked it and A season for miracles. Not as fond of the thrd one.
